individual.title: Personal
individual.subtitle: As an individual, when you reach 5,000 USD / year you’ll need to create a dedicated entity.

company.title: Company
company.subtitle: As an organisation, you are responsible for your statements in your country of residence, and for your coworkers.

selfEmployed.title: Self employed
selfEmployed.subtitle: As an self-employed, you are responsible for your statements in your country of residence.

description.INDIVIDUAL: As an individual, when you reach 5,000 USD / year you’ll need to create a dedicated entity.
description.SELF_EMPLOYED: As an self-employed, you are responsible for your statements in your country of residence.
description.COMPANY: As an organisation, you are responsible for your statements in your country of residence, and for your coworkers.
